hadiths.text: Narrated Aisha, Ummul Mu'minin: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to eat melon with fresh dates, and he used to say: The heat of the one is broken by the coolness of the other, and the coolness of the one by the heat of the other

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْجَمْعِ بَيْنَ لَوْنَيْنِ فِي الأَكْلِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding combining two types of food
